tha-ap103:4.4: Vanā nibbanamāgataṃ → vānā nibbānamāgataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap103:6.1: Padenānupadāyantaṃ → padenānupadaṃ santaṃ (bj) | padenānupadāyanto (si, sya1ed, sya2ed) | padenānupadaṃyanto (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap103:6.4: buddhe ādiccabandhune → ... bandhuni (bj) | buddhassādiccabandhuno (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
